name: Frozen Fears
description:
Find your way home.

This is a short, experimental game in the style of a monochrome walking simulator. The game environment is extremely dark with very limited sight distance, and players must rely on carefully listening to audio cues. Some sounds indicate threats, one sound indicates home. All are subtle. Good headphones and a dark room are musts for this game to be experienced as intended.

8GB RAM, AMD Radeon 570 or higher video processor recommended.
